message: May today be the beginning of a long, happy life together. Lovyouu kakak ku 🩵🩵
Love you guys! All the best for the new beginning. Always being part of each others lives created long lasting memories and we couldn't be happier for you <3
Selamat menempuh hidup baru, semoga selalu sehat dan bahagia.
Sakinah mawaddah wa rahmah
So excited to celebrate with you guys! Wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness, we love you <3

Dear my beloved bestie SANDRA IRIANDINI… Actually i am speechless writing this but i know i have to..🥹🥹🥹 Got ur wed invitation made me cry already.. happy ones for sure. Now u are in a different stage found ur man already for the rest of ur life. I hope you and Dorian will always count each other, support and loving each other. And for Dorian, please be always the man that sandra will always look at in up n down no matter how the condition is. We will always be here if u guys need our help, love and care just like you two especially in mental support. We hope you two will always have ur special way and enjoy full of laughter and joy… Well u guys know better for sure cz i am not good in this one but my action will speaks louder 😘 Love you guys. Happy WEDDING MY BRO N SIST ❤️❤️❤️❤️💋💋💋💋

Dear Kak Sandra & Dorian, Congratulations on this beautiful journey you're about to embark on together. May your marriage be filled with endless love, joy, and understanding. May your days be full of laughter and your hearts always beat as one. Wishing you a lifetime of happiness and blessings. Cheers to your forever!

Dear Dorian and Sandra  Sorry I might not come to your wedding party but I would like to say "Wishing you guys a lifetime of happiness and love as you both begin this beautiful journey together" All the best, Bryan
Dear Dorian and Sandra, We are counting days to your special day!! A BIG PARTY!! 🥰 Can't wait to be there 🥰 We hope that you guys can be team as always! Semoga cintanya nambah terus setiap hari ❤️❤️

Dear Sandra & Dorian, you're embarking on a new adventure full of promise and love, and we can only hope that your union will be filled with happiness, complicity and precious moments. We wish you a life together where every day will strengthen your love, and where you will always find comfort and strength in each other. May you create together unforgettable memories and build a warm and welcoming home. We are sincerely happy for you. With all our affection, Muriel & Romain
Wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness 💖💕
We feel so honoured to be invited ❤️❤️❤️ We are sure you will have an amazing day and we wish you all the best ❤️❤️❤️
Congratulations with your marriage! We ar looking forward to celebrate it with you! We wish you a lifetime of love and happiness 🥰
May the years ahead be filled with lasting love and happiness and this day mark the beginning of a lifetime together. Wishing you both a happy and prosperous future. ❤️
Good luck lids!
Happy wedding wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness
we love you guys <3

Sooo happy for both of you and looking more than forward to this happy event. We are very honored to be invited! What an outstanding invitation. We fully trust that not only the wedding but the whole trip will be unforgettable and an amazing highlight also in our lives. Very grateful for you both 😘
I CANT WAITTTTT TO SEE YOU GUYS IN BALI!!!

Congratulations Dorian n Sandra! InshaAllah we will coming guys! All the best for the preparations 🤍 Super excited for you guys! 😍 Finally the invitation is published! We're so happy to read the invitation. We wish you guys all the best for the preparations. Stay healthy and pour each other's with love and joy! Sampai Jumpa! 🥰
Je vous souhaite plein de bonheur et une très belle fête !
Yang pasti semoga sakinah, mawaddah dan penuh rohmah. Tiga itu pasti abadi dan rejeki melimpah

Congratulations to the beautiful newlyweds! Sandra, you've found your perfect match, and Dorian, you're one lucky guy! Wishing you both a lifetime of love, laughter, and amazing adventures together. May your journey be filled with joy, and may you always find happiness in each other. Cheers to forever 🥰
Can't wait to travel the world 🗺️ to see your promise to share your life together. And they lived happily ever after...
This website and these photos are absolutely amazing! But they are nothing compared to the love and appreciation I have for you all and the moments we've shared together. Hâte d'y être !!
Happily ever after You two were simply made for each other.. God bless you Dorian & Sandra Congrats
VOUS ETES LES BEST, trop hâte de fêter tout ça avec vous, et on vous souhaite le meilleur !!

Hello dear Sandra and Dorian, Marie-Pierre and I are delighted without limit at the idea of sharing with you all this memorable moment that will be your union celebrated in this heavenly place that is Bali. As a dad, I am proud of your life path and wish you all the happiness possible. We are organizing our trip now in order to join you and vibrate with you this momentum that already promises to be fabulous. Halo Sandra dan Dorian yang terkasih, Marie-Pierre dan saya sangat gembira tanpa batas atas gagasan untuk berbagi dengan Anda semua momen yang tak terlupakan ini yang akan menjadi perayaan persatuan kalian di tempat surgawi ini yaitu Bali. Sebagai seorang ayah, saya bangga dengan jalan hidupmu dan mendoakan agar kamu semua memperoleh kebahagiaan. Kami sekarang sedang mengatur perjalanan kami untuk bergabung dengan Anda dan merasakan bersama Anda momentum ini yang sudah menjanjikan akan luar biasa. Vive les Mariés ! :-) Long live the Bride and Groom ! :-) Hiduplah pengantin baru ! :-)
Happy Marriage. I am looking forward to celebrating with you
Selamat men empul hidup baru Semoga langgeng ,sehat Dan bahagia
Congratulations dear... wish you a happy life & eternal love forever 😇
Wishing you the happily ever after you both deserve! Love you guy's
Hi, congratulation. May the vows you took today last an eternity, and the love in your eyes never fade. May you forever be as happy as you are today 🥰😘
Samawa ya..

Dear Sandra & Dorian, Wishing you a lifetime filled with love, joy, and unforgettable memories. I'd love to be there to celebrate with you on your special day and to witness your love story unfold. ☺️

Dear Mace & Dorian, congratulations on your wedding! I was really looking forward to celebrating with you, but I've just realized that 22 September 2025 will mark the second anniversary of my son's passing, and I'll be in my hometown to commemorate that day. But please know that my heart will be with you both as you celebrate this beautiful milestone. Wishing you guys a lifetime of love and happiness! 😇♥️

Dorian, ever since I met you I knew you were one of those, difficult to find and very precious, kind souls. Fate brought you guys together and I cannot be happier for the two of you. Sandra, you found a rare diamond in Dorian, always keep him shining. Dorian, you hit the jackpot with Sandra, it’s not everyday you find such a beautiful and aligned partner. Wish you all the best!
Turut berbahagia atas pernikahan kalian, lovebirds. Rukun, sehat, dan penuh berkat berdua selamanya, Sandra & Dorian. 😍 We love you guys! Rendy, Sylvia, Zio
Wish you a wonderful wedding, and nothing but love and happiness on this new journey together!
Hi Sandra and Dorian, we are sorry we might not come to your wedding party. However, wishing you nothing but a lifetime of love. Cheers 💐🥂
